website_summaries.verdict: A high-end look without the high price. Easy-to-clean microfiber with tufted details give these a touch of class that adds sophistication to your dining room.
pros: Their light weight makes them easy to move around
cons: Some units had uneven legs with a few also having rippling in the fabric

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful chairs!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful chairs! One of my dining chairs broke and I needed to find replacement to match my existing ones. Found this good deal $133 two pack on Amazon! Wow color was versatile and basically goes with anything! Very good quality chairs and super fast delivery! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: namtaitai

customer_reviews.title: Love! Super easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Love! Super easy to assemble. Turn the chair upside down, unzip the liner & the legs are inside. The hardware includes an allen wrench which really helps! As long as you completely tighten the hardware, the chairs are very sturdy. I got them in gray & get nonstop compliments on them.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: First, they have more of a blue tint to the gray than is pictured, but my husband and I decided we liked the shape so we kept them. After 3 months the front leg of one of them was wobbly, when I went to tighten it, the wood piece that secures the leg to the chair crumbled into pieces! My husband and I live alone and we rarely use these chairs. I think we have used them a handful of times, so we were really disappointed. Will be replacing with another chair.
customer_reviews.author: Heather E

customer_reviews.title: I felt like a dummy when I realized they were zipped into ...
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are gorgeous. I didn't realize the leg pieces were inside of the lining of the chair. I thought the company forgot the legs and almost returned the chairs. I felt like a dummy when I realized they were zipped into the bottom of the chair the entire time. They came way sooner than was expected. Beautiful quality and a I love the soft gray c They look super expensive. I would definitely would recommend these chairs!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great Chairs!
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased these chairs from Amazon prime. I received them within a week in perfect conditions. The chairs are sturdy, feel and look great! I love these chairs, I have no complaints whatsoever! The color is a light brown and looks very exquisite. These chairs look like I bought them at a high end furniture store, like Pottery Barn. Highly recommended. PS: The chair legs are located on the bottom of the chair, behind the zipper.
customer_reviews.author: Max Gallardo

customer_reviews.title: Neither sturdy nor comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My product did not arrive with squished foam seats like other reviews mentioned. However once assembled my husband who is approximately 230lbs scooted under the table on his chair on hardwood floors and we heard a loud crunch from one of the legs on his chair. This was an average motion and nothing extravagant. Not sturdy whatsoever. Also when I was seated on the chair I could feel the wood frame through the cushion. I am approximately 200lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Crown Jul

customer_reviews.title: Durable chairs!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these for my dining room table. I was hesitant, as I have two toddler boys that destroy everything they touch. These have held up wonderfully. Best of all, the fabric just wipes clean with a damp Norwex cloth. No stains, even though they've been spills on numerous times. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: YS

customer_reviews.title: Amazing chairs - just follow instructions!!!
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are perfect. I ordered 4 and decided to order 4 more to redo my dining area with them. The instructions are perfect. The holes line up if you make sure you have the legs in the right side. They are marked A,B,C,D. The legs are zippered in under the seats. Do not force the screws. That’s what splits the leg and that’s probably why some people have had legs break. If you have to force the screws then switch out the legs until you get the screw to fit. These are beautiful chairs. I did not have any indentions in my seats. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: D Greene

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL packaging results in dented seat cushions
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are beautiful! They were exactly the color/style I needed. However they packaging from Dorel is awful! They are 2 chairs/box but the way they package them results in both chairs having dented seats in the corners. I loved the chairs and waited as long as I could to see if maybe the seat cushion would pop back up to the correct shape. But it never did. So sadly I had to return them. There's no way I could justify keeping chairs with dented corners on the seat cushion. Please learn how to package these chairs safely.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Russo

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely stunning chairs
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these chairs. They are very comfortable and the perfect height for all of my family members. The tufting design is deep and well crafted. These truly look like they would cost double what I paid. I purchased the "taupe" color and I can confirm that these are essentially a light grey with very very light undertones of brown but almost a true light grey. If you need these paired with other gray furniture it works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Annabella

customer_reviews.title: Legs broke within 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Barely six months old and the leg of one has snapped and the legs on the other one feel vulnerable. I'm so disappointed as the chairs are actually really comfortable. These chairs were not overly used, abused, or assembled incorrectly. This is a design fault or quality fault. Such a shame. **I"m amending my previous 1 star review to reflect my contacting customer service. There is a 1 year warranty on the chairs. The customer service rep was really nice and they are sending me new legs via UPS today. I'm still disappointed in the quality of the legs**
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy this or similar products from the Seller/Vendor "0" Star
customer_reviews.text: It was a MISTAKE! We gave "3 stars and Good for Money" remarks on our purchase because of packaging and assembled arrival. B U T the product has issues with issues. We are only 2 to sit (under 190 pounds in weight) and dine. Legs have issues in a year. We can't fix them. Shame such a low level manufactures products sold in AMAZON that we shall be throwing them in the garbage. Loss of investment. Shame on AMAZON to carry Such Vendors in the Sellers List. Our Old Chairs we used for over 10 years, were still in great shape. What a loss of our Investment in our Senior Age.
customer_reviews.author: Ajwani

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! LEGS are under seats.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love everything about this chair....classy design, curve back legs and back support gives it a soft and elegant look, true gray color, attachment on bottom legs to protect wood floors and smooth sliding, color of legs just about match my dining table (no red tone), quick and easy install (allen wrench included)...just jiggle legs if screw gets stuck, all legs are perfectly even, nice fabric, thick cushion, very comfortable, superb quality and workmanship, secret compartment to stash my gold...lol, low price $200/set. I can't say enough great things about these chairs. One of my best purchase on Amazon. Extremely HAPPY...highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Link37

customer_reviews.title: Not an espresso leg color
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely in love with these chairs. Very comfortable. Easy to assemble, packaging was amazing. Sturdy and very pleasing to the eye. The only reason I give this a 3/5 stars is because the picture and description give espresso for the leg color. Very disappointed when I opened the box, fell in love with the seat than once I saw the legs they are no where near espresso, instead they very red in color. They do not match my table, my kitchen/ dining room theme and stand out. I have thought about returning the whole chair but instead I am researching ways to either get new legs or change the color myself which is a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: carla lynn

customer_reviews.title: Just short of 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: The chairs are a taupe/grey color. The legs are a cherry/brown color. Very easy to assemble, just attached the legs. Thick padding but just received today so can't attest to how long that will last. Perfect seat height and depth. The reason for 4 instead of five stars is because on both chairs, one front leg is shorter than the other three. I've tried to adjust the legs to make them all even but decided to add feet to the short leg and call it a day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and comfortable chairs
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these chairs. Couldn’t be happier with them. We needed comfortable chairs to use at our table for long dinners and nights of card games. These were just the ticket, the fabric is plush, and soft taupe color looks great. Very easy assembly - just attach legs and they are good to go. We didn’t have any issues with the legs or any instability as others that wrote reviews did. Maybe any kinks were now worked out. We thought they were just the ticket - good looking, well padded, comfortable tufted backs - all added up to a happy purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CSJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice chairs, but wobble.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the overall look of the chairs. Very easy to assemble. However, one front leg on both chairs is too short. I contacted Amazon and was told I couldn't just get a new leg. I needed to return the pair, and repurchase. Seems like a whole lot of trouble for 2 chair legs. I didn't bother, and will just have to live with 2 wobbly chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfortable great quality chairs
customer_reviews.text: I really like these chairs. The are good quality for the price. They look high end and I get compliments on them all the time! I bought my table from ikea so it needed to be dressed up a little and these really make it look overall a lot better in my dining room! They were super easy to assemble, didn’t even need my husband!! They feel sturdy and I love that! My chairs didn’t have anything wrong with them like I read in their reviews. I ordered the color taupe and they look more gray to me which I like same as in the picture. I WOULD RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.author: kriskrause

customer_reviews.title: Legs are uneven on all 6 chairs
customer_reviews.text: One leg is shorter than the others on all 6 chairs I bought. Clearly they have an issue with quality control because after I had this problem, I found reviews from others with the same issue. I can understand an issue with one chair out of 6, but all 6 chairs? I can't return them because I didn't keep the boxes. The legs and chair frame come pre drilled, so there is no way to attach them wrong. They are garbage.
customer_reviews.author: ChiMac

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 8 chairs and all were delivered without issue. I followed several reviewers tips on tightening the legs with the chair upright to get it level (I'd also recommend putting some weight on the seat while doing so) and it worked out great. Of the 8 chairs, 2 had a leg that was shorter than the rest but the wobbling isn't noticeable when you're sitting in it. They do take some time to unbox and assemble, so I did 2 each night (~30 minutes). Also, pleased with the seat cushion, it's nice and thick, pretty comfortable! I love how these chairs look in my dining room, would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Received a mess
customer_reviews.text: Ordered four chairs and three of them were in horrible shape! Two had legs that were damaged and the other had one short leg and three normal sized ones which caused it to wobble! After months of looking and being hesitant of ordering these chairs then pulling the buy handle and getting damaged chairs I am beyond disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: These chairs are awesome! Very comfortable and so far durable
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are awesome! Very comfortable and so far durable. The only con is that upon receiving the chairs one of them has a small imperfection.. Just one of the "buttons" is brown.... Instead of the blue gray color it's supposed to be...otherwise they're great! Only reason we didn't return it to get it fixed or replaced is because we needed them for company to sit on so we just kept it. Edit: its been over a year and these beauties are still standing, i change my review from like it to love it! they have endured so much and have wiped clean so easy! they're still sturdy still beautiful and perfect! we love them!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan P.

customer_reviews.title: Due to the previous reviews it said Taupe looked more like a lighter grey
customer_reviews.text: I ordered four chairs in Taupe. Due to the previous reviews it said Taupe looked more like a lighter grey, which was what I wanted so they are perfect! The chairs are absolutely beautiful. Assembly was easy since I only had to put the legs on. I would have given this 5 stars, Only two of the chairs came today instead of all 4 as it should have been, so I was a little dissapointed. Other than the problem with not getting all the chairs today as expected the chairs are great.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievably comfy and high quality!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I went all over town looking for chairs to go with a round table we purchased at Pier 1. After looking at Pier 1 and other stores we decided to try these due to the high price of most chairs that looked similar. Most importantly, we wanted comfort and a modern look. These chairs are just as or more comfortable than the Pier 1 chairs, but actually the style and color of these are superior. The legs are zipped inside the liner underneath each chair. Super easy to assemble and look fantastic. I had to reread the price a few times- yes, you get two for the price listed!!
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: We love our chairs
customer_reviews.text: We love our chairs! The Grey is a silver color. They are comfortable and stylish. We have had these over a year now and they are still like new even when using daily. We sprayed them heavily with scotch guard and have not gotten one stain. Wobbly?? Common guys!! There are little feet on the bottoms of each leg that adjust to level the chairs out. We actually took these out and put felt on the bottom to protect our hardwood floors. We did have to put 2 on one of them but it works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Sandeno

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE!!
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are beautiful and very well made! Exact color I was looking for, my daughter will love these for her christmas present! I also can't believe the great price I got these for. They were very well packaged and I didn't have one single issue. The legs were easy to attach and once they were on they were not wobbly at all. I have another package of these coming in a few days so I hope that they will be just as great! I am very very pleased you will not be disappointed and I can't say enough good things about them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So freakin cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute, comfy, sturdy, looks great. When attaching the legs to one of the chairs, I definitely screwed in one of the screws a little too far, and I think it caused part of the leg to crack -- nothing visible, but that leg creaks sometimes when I'm seated and lean to that leg. Not a defect in the chair, but I recommend being careful not to tighten the screws too far when attaching the legs.
customer_reviews.author: antisocial.ite

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, sturdy, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This “2 pack” of chairs was cery reasonably priced- almost cheaper than 1 similar chair at Target! Arrived quickly and took 1 mom 15 min to assemble both-just hand turning/allen wrenching screws (everything included!!). So pretty!
customer_reviews.author: FrancescaTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Suits my needs
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking and surprisingly comfortable chairs. I purchased 4 pairs, out of the 8 chairs one chair arrived with 4 back legs and no front legs. I called the company and they quickly shipped out the two needed front legs which arrived in 2 days. I use these for the formal dining room, they do not see a lot of use. If I were using them daily I would choose a chair with more durable fabric and construction. That said great quality for the price, customer service was easy and prompt.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together but need a little brawn to ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together but need a little brawn to make sure the legs are not wobbly. The chair is comfortable and look good in my guest and living room as a accent chair. The color is light beige if you wonder what taupe is....and it went well with my gray walls. The material should be scotch guard if used daily as they may stain easily. That's the only reason I'm not giving it a five star.
customer_reviews.author: CrzyGlow

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful chairs!
customer_reviews.text: I received these chairs a couple of weeks ago and absolutely love them! They are comfortable and were easy to assemble. One of the legs was missing one of the little plastic adjuster things on the bottom and I called the company and I had a whole new leg in two days. Their customer service is amazing and the chairs great quality. I also got them at a great price which makes me even happier!
customer_reviews.author: JV

customer_reviews.title: Maybe a bad review will get me some help!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 5th attempt to get some help and I am getting frustrated. I ordered these chairs. I received the seats and hardware. No legs were shipped. If I enjoyed sitting on the floor I would have purchased some decorative pillows to sit on not dining chairs!!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful chairs. They arrived today and I love them
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful chairs. They arrived today and I love them! Elegant and classy. My friend bought them as a gift, I will be buying 4 more totaling 6. On a comfort level I'll give it a 6.7 to 7. However, once broken in that score may go up. Great buy. Notably the price increased significantly. I will watch for a price drop, if the price doesn't decrease to the price I bought it for or less $124.00, I will not buy additional chairs, I will complete my dinning room seating with a different set of chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these chairs!! They look amazing and oh so comfy. Took awhile to assemble but that is only because I bought 8 lol. Needed some good, sturdy and nice looking chairs and these fit the bill. Very reasonable price for great quality. Couldn't be happier with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: kjmomma

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love my chairs you can see before and after..
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome addition to dining room
customer_reviews.text: These chairs add class to our dining room. They are beautiful, sturdy, and light at the same time making them easy to move. I highly recommend them to spruce up a dining room and still be very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING QUALITY/COLOR/FAST SHIPPING
customer_reviews.text: LOVEEEEEE these chairs literally just put them together. Very easy and quick assembly!!!! amazing quality!!!!! goes well with beige and gray colors of the hourse decor. When you take out of the package the corners of the chairs look a little indented but it's a memory foam type of chair so let it sit and rub the spot with your palm a little and it will look perfect. . VERY HAPPY with this purchase and product!!!! thank you. Just ordered another set :) Amazing quality great price and product. Fast service. All happiness over here :)
customer_reviews.author: hollywood

customer_reviews.title: Great value & comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are shapely & comfortable! The fabric is a very versatile microfiber. They are soft to the touch and luxurious. They look far more expensive than they actually were. I bought spray cans of fabric repellent to insure easy cleaning. ( 1 can = 4 chairs) Another terrific feature are the legs can be adjusted to accommodate uneven floors. The taupe was perfect balance of gray/brown and was a great neutral.
customer_reviews.author: Lorie Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly nice
customer_reviews.text: These were shipped well and are very nice for the price. I have had no real issues with them in the two months I've had them. I am slightly concerned the padding will become uncomfortable quickly from normal use. Would recommend either way since they could be re-stuffed.
customer_reviews.author: Shane B.

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are (as many have said m) surprisingly good looking and substantial and SUPER easy to assemble. The color is beautiful gray and velvety soft tufting is a nice accent. So, my thing is that it is not a big chair- for tall folks I think it’s potentially not a good fit. I will definitely keep them because of the above great qualities and they were so inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: TK20

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are well made and comfortable. The overall impression of quality is way beyond what one might expect, considering the price. They arrived well packed and were easy to assemble. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Bror

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the Taupe and I absolutely love these! They arrived in perfect condition and the exact colour I was hoping for based on the pictures online. They were very well packaged. I did get a tiny bit of scutching at the corners that other reviewers have mentioned, but after letting it relax out of its packaging it went away. The legs are inside the fabric base of each chair and you simply unzip that portion to retrieve them. I gave myself a nice little project and opted to spruce them up a bit with some upholstery nails and they look perfect!
customer_reviews.author: La Toya Woods

customer_reviews.title: The chairs look very nice but negative reviews are true
customer_reviews.text: The chairs look very nice but negative reviews are true. Both chairs has dents in them from packaging but not bad enough to return, I think they will puff back up in time. One chair is sturdy, the other wobbles like the chair legs are uneven. Not off by much, was able to fix pretty easily. Overall I think they are great looking chairs for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Ok chairs but...
customer_reviews.text: Not the best chairs but they will do for the money paid. Problem is, is how the manufacturer stuffs the chairs in the boxes for shipment. The chairs have dents in the seats that that will not go away. Makes the chairs look defective.
customer_reviews.author: mrstylovesdecor

customer_reviews.title: Nice comfortable chairs
customer_reviews.text: The way the chairs look are very nice the only issue is that some of the chairs wobble. you will have to find something to adjust the bottom of the chairs. Overall I really like them
customer_reviews.author: monae11

customer_reviews.title: almost like it was stabbed with a knife
customer_reviews.text: One of the four chairs I ordered came with a stain on the seat, several stains on the back, and a hole in the top of the chair, almost like it was stabbed with a knife. If it weren't for those issues I would give it a better rating, however I do think they're overpriced for the quality/workmanship. If they were $50 a chair rather then the $95 I paid they'd be worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Allie Michaels

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THESE CHAIRS
customer_reviews.text: Packaging is awful. All kinds of problems: a) due to the way 2 chairs are packed together in one box both end up having the same issue: interior urethane foam has clefts which makes you return them right away, b) finishing on the sides is terrible, you can see urethane foam coming out and the cloth is wrongly cut, c) One of the legs was impossible to screw in because one of the nuts inside the wood is so way in that the screw cannot reach it. DO NOT BUY THESE CHAIRS.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy !! Very versatile chair !!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and sturdy, neutral color, used for extra chairs at the diningtable and then moved one into a bedroom for an extra chair and one in the family room , they look good as an occasional chair and as a dining room chair. The back is padded too which I feel makes them nicer than expected for the price and they'll last longer, too.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne

customer_reviews.title: Nice chairs for a good price.
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are perfect for my dining room. They are a true light grey and look wonderful. My only complaint is that the legs are not even and it takes a bit of time to level out.
customer_reviews.author: Stefmav1

customer_reviews.title: Recommend excellent chairs.
customer_reviews.text: Chairs came in one big box and was very impressed. We did freak out a moment when we didn’t see the legs. Wife found a zipper under the seat and the legs were inside. Smart place to put them but put that in the instructions. Chairs look good and very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Luxurious and comfortable at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: The delivery was extremely delayed and hard to track. Other than that. It was packaged securely. Did not take long to put together. Very comfortable. Luxurious and great combo with my table I purchased separately. I’m very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Marisol Guadalupe

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Stunning and Worth it! Don't hesitate.
customer_reviews.text: They are absolutely stunning ❤️ worth every penny. I'm so satisfy with those chairs, exactly what I expected for a great and affordable price. Arrived more faster than the estimate date.
customer_reviews.author: Karla Brito

customer_reviews.title: Great price for stylish, comfortable chairs!
customer_reviews.text: I love these chairs! They look great in my small dining room. They were eay to assemble, and the price was great! Fast shipping! I would buy these chairs again.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Hendrix

customer_reviews.title: NO QUALITY CONTROL
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful chairs. Easy to assemble. BUT upholstery was horrible! Staples on the back of the chairs were completely visible and there was quite a bit of puckering in the fabric. Also we had issues with the legs being wobbly because they were uneven. One chair had a leg that was one inch shorter than than the rest. These chairs were very reasonably priced and now I know why :(
customer_reviews.author: Lady Z

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I just got them today, they were easy to put together, and yes some had @ leg a litte shorter than the others, but the slider at the bottom is adjustable and it's easily fixed. I love how tbey look with my table...very shabby shic. I only wish the pictures were more true to the color....they look grey in the picture but it is more on the very light side of cocoa....more beige than grey.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Letheby

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy! Leg broke off
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy these chairs. At first I was in love with them well tonight one of the legs broke off of the chair while my daughter who weighs only 40 pounds was sitting in it. Luckily she just got a couple of bruises. Ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: hopeful

customer_reviews.title: A Wobbly Mess
customer_reviews.text: We have had these chairs for a little over a month and despite needing to tighten screws several times since buying chairs, the legs keep becoming loose. Both chairs become wobbly despite constant need to adjust the screws in the legs. I would not suggest buying these chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these chairs
customer_reviews.text: Chairs is beautiful, mine didnt come with any screws up under the chair to assemble so I had to buy them off amazon no hardware stores sold the 5/16 bolt. But I was offered a partial refund so I was happy!
customer_reviews.author: Rookie

customer_reviews.title: Super Seats!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these chairs. They're easy to clean and look very expensive. I receive compliments on them regularly. The color is perfect and they have survived my 3 year old son for almost a year with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful. I got these chairs and a small table to replace a bench I had in my living room that unfortunately broke after lending to a friend. I got the gray color option and it’s a really pretty pale blue/gray microfiber. The material is really soft and plush. I was hesitant because of the price since I found similar chairs for a much higher price point. I’m really happy with these. It took me maybe less than 30 minutes to assemble both chairs myself.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Sheehan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect dining chairs
customer_reviews.text: The chairs were easy to assemble. Arrived in perfect shape. I highly recommend these. They looked great when assembled and I get lots of compliments on them. I may try to squeeze in 2 more chairs for 8 total around our table.
customer_reviews.author: bb79

customer_reviews.title: I ordered four of these chairs for my dining room and really like the way they look and sit!
customer_reviews.text: I found the best price for these chairs on Amazon. They came easy to assemble with a zip lining under seat with legs and hardware. Really neat concept. They look really classy with my table and more comfortable than wood chairs. For as little as we use the dining room I did not want to spend a lot of money and felt I got what I wanted for a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: The quality of these chairs is good, the fabric is very pretty,color exactly as pictured, and they seem tough/will wear well. However the craftsmanship isnt the best...the legs dont fit properly/snug when attached to the chair. There is a noticeable gap between the base of the chair and where the legs screw in. But they seem sturdy and do the trick so I cant really complain much.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly

customer_reviews.title: One leg is short
customer_reviews.text: The product looks good. We had a very hard time assembling them as one of the legs always came out shorter then the rest. It required a lot of effort to make the chairs work.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Amazing chairs for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these chairs for our small 4 person table. The chairs are gorgeous chairs - firm, solid construction, beautiful velvet fabric. The only drawback is that the taupe appears more grayish then expected, but I decided to keep them nonetheless. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Meg77

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend them for sure
customer_reviews.text: I read everyone's comments before buying and was hesitant at first due to complaints about the edges being smooshed by the packaging of the chairs together. However, while I did notice it when I first got the chairs,that was a month or so ago and the edges have gone back to normal and you can't tell at all now. These chairs look way more expensive then they were and I get tons of compliments on them. I would recommend them for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Heather C.

customer_reviews.title: Love !!
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like the picture ! I ordered the taupe color and it’s perfect ! It’s sturdy , comfortable, and easy to assemble . My boyfriend didn’t believe i put it together myself lol . They look expensive. Definitely worth the money .
customer_reviews.author: Janiece

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I was worried that the chairs would look too bulky for my small space. I was pleasantly surprised and happy once I set them up. They look beautiful and very comfy! The back rest feels great on the back! I recommend these!!! I love the gray microfiber!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE MY NEW CHAIRS! 😍
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one set from amazon warehouse condition: Used-Acceptable..... at first I was confused about the description of wear/damage until I read a post online. The description is of THE BOX/PACAKGING, not of the actual chairs. My chairs were in perfect condition. No issues at all. I just ordered a second set. Fingers crossed all is well with the new order. 🤞
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Better than I had expected!!
customer_reviews.text: No complaints here! The chairs look much nicer in person than in the pictures. I purchased 6 grey chairs for my 60" tulip table and the effect is lovely. My 7 year old managed to rub green marker on one of the seats and (after my initial panic) it came right off with water and a pinch of Dawn on a paper towel. I've since scotchguarded them 😉 Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Miles

customer_reviews.title: Late and uneven legs
customer_reviews.text: Product was very late, missing hardware due shipping box damage. Product okay. Comfortable, material fabric cheap. Legs are uneven. Going to spray with scotch guard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, comfortable and a price that can't be beat.
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are super comfy, look expensive and great in our dining room. All I had to do was assemble the legs. I would recommend taking the adjustable feet off and getting a screwed in felt pad so they don't scratch he floor.
customer_reviews.author: b4komer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are a great buy!!! Not the sturdiest to be honest, but we screwed the nails in and then glued them so they would stop wiggling!
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Simple and yet beautiful chairs
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, affordable and comfortable chairs! Added them to my farmhouse table to give it a softer look. They were easy to put together. Just keep that little tool handy because the bolts can loosen up. No biggy, everything needs time to settle. (All items are in the bottom of chairs) Tightened once so not a real issue. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer F. Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Unleveled legs
customer_reviews.text: I assembled both chairs, and both had unleveled legs so it would move or trip forward every time someone sits on the chair or moves. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Love the chairs!
customer_reviews.text: I think these are my best purchase ever. They are great! Simple and sturdy assembly. I do, however, have one problem. When the chairs arrived, there was a black mark across one seat and I have tried to no avail to contact the company to replace the seat cushion. I love the chairs enough to have attempted to clean the upholstery, but the stain will not come out. I do not wish to return them, only have the seat cushion replaced. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Karen W.

customer_reviews.title: A+ costumer service
customer_reviews.text: Classic curved design; sturdy & comfortable; easy to assemble. One chair was missing their set of legs. Upon contacting the seller, issue was rectified immediately. Communication was a breeze, very professional & efficient.
customer_reviews.author: M D

customer_reviews.title: 4 years later...
customer_reviews.text: Love these chairs. 4 years later here I am looking up these chairs to buy again because they have held up. Comfortable, easy to clean, and durable! These chairs have lasted! Although they’ve went up in price since my original purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty chairs at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these chairs! They are sturdy and pretty, love the soft fabric! I love how the back of them are higher than most chairs, which was my deciding factor when purchasing these!
customer_reviews.author: Taylors Closet

customer_reviews.title: These chairs are beautiful and look very classy
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are beautiful and look very classy. The fabric is like a brushed suede, not velvet, but it makes little difference. The wood is not a dark ebony... it is a nice dark brown wood with reddish tones-NOT MAHOGANY or CHERRY at all. It matches my Z Gallerie table exactly and I love them!! I had a couple problems with damage to the corner of the cushions but Amazon resolved the issues instantly!! Great value!
customer_reviews.author: coleen

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love these chairs
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these chairs! Arrived in 3 days in a perfect condition, very satisfied with the purchase. The chairs are very light dove gray color that I was looking for to match my décor. They are soft and comfortable to sit in and hug you at the back with velvety to touch fabric. I'm getting a dining room table soon and might purchase more of these chairs for more sitting.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Uneven legs :(
customer_reviews.text: The legs are not even, so the chairs wobble and don’t sit evenly. I’ve had to tighten the legs already, and I feel like the bolts would strip with the Allen wrench. They look pretty, but that’s about it.
customer_reviews.author: jen greenwell

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs for my dining room.
customer_reviews.text: Love these chairs. They were easy to put together. It is strange that the seller will only allow you to purchase one pair. I found a couple of friends with Prime to get the 4 others that I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Curtis

customer_reviews.title: In love with my beautiful dining chairs
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful dining chairs. The color the material and the craftsmanship is perfect for the price. I ordered the cocoa and the color is a beautiful compliment in my rustic dining room. Only thing I would point out is the fact the legs of the chairs is a cherry color my table is a dark brown so it stands out a bit but not enough for me to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzy

customer_reviews.title: Look nice and seem sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Look nice and seem sturdy. Super easy to put together. They'd be great for dining chairs. I got mine for a tiny TV room I have. Not the most comfortable thing to sit in for two hours to watch a movie... but like I said earlier, would be fine for dining.
customer_reviews.author: M. A. Hepburn

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect seat height, damaged in shipping
customer_reviews.text: Several complaints about the product: 1. The box arrived very damaged, no longer even taped shut. 2. There are dents in the corners of the chairs. 3. The seat height is not correct. It's about 18 1/2" - 19" in height.
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to my sitting area! Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Assembled in seconds. The legs are in the zipper area on the bottom! Looked amazing right out of the box. Will be purchasing 2 more soon!
customer_reviews.author: Holly Norton

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the texture and color. They look amazing in the dining room and ate very comfy. I give it a four because the front legs once installed are short and wobbles a little but when not installed they are the same size.
customer_reviews.author: channie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. Classic. Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I love these chairs. I needed chairs to go with a table I got from Pier 1 to fit in my tiny NYC kitchen. They are even better than I imagined. Easy to assemble and comfy to sit in for long periods of time. Don’t hesitate....buy them!
customer_reviews.author: HiHeels25

customer_reviews.title: Not what we expected...
customer_reviews.text: The material is thin. They sent 4 rear legs for one of the chairs and was missing the fronts. The backs of these chairs are straight up and down. Not what I expected. Slow shipping.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous chairs.
customer_reviews.text: gorgeous chairs! Looks soo much more expensive than they are. Very comfortable. Downside is they wobbled initially, but after sitting on them for a bit, it seems to balance itself out. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: J. Foy

customer_reviews.title: dreamy
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE LOVE LOVE these chairs. The hourglass back makes a big difference in style, but also in function. Its like the chair is huggin you! Super soft, just dreamy to sit on. SO happy with this purchase. SO easy to put together. Took me 15 minutes to put together both chairs. LOVE
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Worth it for the price
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, easy to clean, great quality for the price. We had one leg split when screwing into the bottom but the manufacturer sent us a replacement part no questions asked. I keep buying these chairs. I’m on number 10 now.
customer_reviews.author: Kate McCroskey

customer_reviews.title: Received damaged chair : (
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 sets of these chairs and have only opened 1 box. Unfortunately, one of the chairs is damaged. The wooden frame, under the seat where the front leg should be inserted, is broken. The packaging was excellent and seemed secure so I think the damage happened before it was packed. I had already assembled the other chair, no problem. The chairs are beautiful and nice quality, but sadly I need to return. Now to seek out yet another set of chairs for the table.
customer_reviews.author: Stuck in Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: I love these chairs! Affordable, order came quickly, no damage, sturdy, comfy & the exact look I was going for.
customer_reviews.author: Amy S.

customer_reviews.title: terrific chairs! solid and classy looking
customer_reviews.text: terrific chairs! solid and classy looking. One note: make sure you tighten the legs properly, as they may become loose, if it wasn't for my laziness they would have been solid. I get many compliments about these chairs and ordering them on amazon was 50 cheaper than wayfair.
customer_reviews.author: Ylo

customer_reviews.title: MISSING HARDWARE
customer_reviews.text: My order is missing ALL HARDWARE! I cannot attach the legs to the chair base and there is no information to contact the seller. The legs are stored underneath and I ordered two pairs of this chair and this pair is missing all hardware. No bolts or washers. Love the chairs, but they are not functional without all the pieces!
customer_reviews.author: Ssandral99

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived with a black stain. I was so disappointed and had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Yaniza

customer_reviews.title: I really like these chairs
customer_reviews.text: I really like these chairs. My husband put them together fairly quickly; fyi legs are under seat bottom; Looked for this color with dark legs to match my side chairs and these were all I could find..Look really nice for such inexpensive chairs, I was pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.author: Christine P. Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Beautiful Chairs!
customer_reviews.text: I received my chairs today and they were all I hoped for and more! They came packaged nicely with 2 chairs per box; I ordered 4. My son I were able to put them together fairly easily. I have had good and bad experiences with things I've ordered from Amazon and I have to say this is one the best buys I've made.
customer_reviews.author: D.

product_meta.title: Dorel Living Clairborne Upholstered dining chair, set of 2, Gray
product_meta.description: Color:GrayThe Better Homes and Gardens Grayson Square Ottoman with Storage is the perfect combination of simple style and versatile practicality. The Grayson features an individually-set antique metal nailhead trim, beautiful linen fabric, and a nicely padded ottoman top, perfect for propping up tired feet after a long day of work or taking care of the children. Built with multiple uses in mind, you can decorate its flat surface with a tray and it will easily double as a coffee table. But the Grayson’s the best kept secret is its easy-to-lift hinged top that will allow you to store away anything from magazines, DVDs, toys, blankets, and pillows. Use the Better Homes and Gardens Grayson Storage Ottoman as a standalone piece or combine it with the matching Better Homes and Gardens Grayson Rolled Top Club Chair with Nailheads (sold separately) for a complete and elegant look. Available in multiple color options.
feature_bullets: Set of 2 dining chairs. Designed with a sturdy construction and features a classic hourglass silhouette and scooped backrest.
Tapered chair back featuring beautiful diamond pattern tufting with covered buttons.
Designed with spring and thick foam padding for a comfortable and durable seat. Promises optimal support and durability with solid wooden legs.
Assembled Dimensions: 21.5 in. W x 25.5 in. D x 40.25 in. H.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars574 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
